children.text: {{ currentItem.ended ? ('took '+moment.duration(new Date(currentItem.ended) - new Date(currentItem.started)).humanize() + ' '+ moment(currentItem.started).fromNow()) : ('running since '+moment(currentItem.started).fromNow(true))}}

children.onClick: {{stop_run.run(() => showAlert('Run has been cancelled','info'), () => showAlert('Unable to cancel run','error'))}}
